description: This file provides validation functions for the Tic Tac Toe game, including input validation for the game board, move index, player, and mode, along with utility functions for parsing and serializing state.

classes.name: DetailedError
classes.description: An extension of Error to include optional code and detail properties for detailed error handling.

methods.name: export function validateBoard(board: Board): asserts board is Board { validateBoard
methods.description: Validates that the board is an array of length 9 with elements null, 'X', or 'O'. Throws an error with specific code if invalid.

methods.name: export function validateMoveIndex(index: number): asserts index is number { validateMoveIndex
methods.description: Ensures that the move index is an integer between 0 and 8, inclusive.

methods.name: export function validatePlayer(player: Player): asserts player is Player { validatePlayer
methods.description: Checks that the player value is either 'X' or 'O'.

methods.name: export function validateMode(mode: string): asserts mode is GameMode { validateMode
methods.description: Ensures the mode is either 'pvp' or 'cpu'.

methods.name: export function safeParseMode(mode: unknown, fallback: GameMode = 'pvp'): GameMode { safeParseMode
methods.description: Attempts to parse an input into a valid GameMode, falling back to a default if invalid.

methods.name: export function serializeStateToUrlSafe(_state: unknown): string { serializeStateToUrlSafe
methods.description: Stub function for serializing game state into a URL-safe string; currently returns an empty string.

ctags.name: err
ctags.pattern: /^      const err: DetailedError = new Error('Invalid board cell value');$/

ctags.name: err
ctags.pattern: /^    const err: DetailedError = new Error('Invalid board structure');$/

ctags.name: err
ctags.pattern: /^    const err: DetailedError = new Error('Invalid player value');$/

ctags.name: err
ctags.pattern: /^    const err: DetailedError = new Error('Move index must be an integer between 0 and 8');$/

ctags.name: err
ctags.pattern: /^    const err: DetailedError = new Error("Mode must be 'pvp' or 'cpu'");$/

ctags.name: safeParseMode
ctags.pattern: /^export function safeParseMode(mode: unknown, fallback: GameMode = 'pvp'): GameMode {$/

ctags.name: validateBoard
ctags.pattern: /^export function validateBoard(board: Board): asserts board is Board {$/

ctags.name: validateMode
ctags.pattern: /^export function validateMode(mode: string): asserts mode is GameMode {$/

ctags.name: validateMoveIndex
ctags.pattern: /^export function validateMoveIndex(index: number): asserts index is number {$/

ctags.name: validatePlayer
ctags.pattern: /^export function validatePlayer(player: Player): asserts player is Player {$/
